entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
